nodes.text: Fizzy Fon Margan was a ronto dealer on the desert planet of Tatooine. In 1 ABY he was at feud with an enraged buyer who thought that Margan had cheated her after she discovered that the ronto she bought from Margan was infested with mites. The buyer tried threats, lawsuits and even hired a gang to beat Margan up twice a day. In retaliation, Margan paid a group of freelancers to destroy the buyer's home and property. To prevent this, the buyer paid a spacer to attack Margan's thugs.

Fizzy Fon Margan is mentioned in the missions "An Aggrieved Customer Is Making My Life Unbearable" and "Stop Goons Hired By Fizzy Fon Margan" in Star Wars Galaxies, that are available to players at mission terminals on Tatooine. In the first mission Margan hires the player to attack the base of the gang that was hired by the buyer. In the second mission "An Aggrieved Ronto Owner" pays the player to attack Margan's thugs. In both missions the player has to destroy a small random base and several NPC enemies.
